name: Guild Hall Adventures
description:
Very early-access of the RPG Clicker game.

You come from a poor town and you lost everything with the monsters that destroyed your family and friends and every hope that you could have by defeating the hordes of monster coming in waves to continue to destroy all the lands in sight.
You have one goal, this goal is go to the Guild Hall that were suppose to have heroes ready to fight these monsters, but to your surprise you find the Guild Hall and the town in shambles.

Dedicating your resolve you decide to repair everything and make your own town and Guild Hall to fight the waves and conquer the hordes of demons.

Harvest > Repair > Research > Upgrade > Create > Kill > Train > Trade.
Fight the monsters and get strong enough with the powerful gear you create for yourself and take on the monsters master and put an end to the destruction!!

Join the discord to find out more about the future updates and share your ideas and the bugs you might find in this game.
